item.title: Configure Microsoft SQL Server Auditing
item.description: If you are a system administrator who works with SQL Server, you know how important it is to audit your SQL Server instances and databases.

item.title: Get KeyWatcher TrueTouch Profile IDs
item.description: Background Morse Watchmans KeyWatcher TrueTouch allows key administrators to assign access to keys based on Profiles. Use of this access, and changes to these profiles, is logged and can be audited using inbuilt reports.
